item.title: I need help bad
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:4, topic:552979”]I know the feeling.

Make sure you’ve done the following (briefly put):

  • Put the server online (often done by clicking run.bat)
  • Changed the client/server so the port is in sync when you’re connecting (aka if your server is running on port 43594 make sure your client is connecting on that port)
  • Changed the client connection IP so it’s connecting to your VPS (not localhost).
  • You’ve portforwarded

Just to clarify, the error you’re getting is “error connecting to server”? If so please PM me the IP/Port you’re trying to connect to.

UPDATE - OP has contacted me on the IRC, and he made a minor error which has now been resolved. Thanks for using MoparScape! :)[/quote]
Since when are you so helpful?

Read full topic

item.title: I need help bad
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I know the feeling.

Make sure you’ve done the following (briefly put):

  • Put the server online (often done by clicking run.bat)
  • Changed the client/server so the port is in sync when you’re connecting (aka if your server is running on port 43594 make sure your client is connecting on that port)
  • Changed the client connection IP so it’s connecting to your VPS (not localhost).
  • You’ve portforwarded

Just to clarify, the error you’re getting is “error connecting to server”? If so please PM me the IP/Port you’re trying to connect to.

UPDATE - OP has contacted me on the IRC, and he made a minor error which has now been resolved. Thanks for using MoparScape!

Read full topic

item.title: I need help bad
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

This is a reply, when somebody posts it’ll come up below mine, just keep refreshing this topic.

It sounds like you need to portforward, and then connect through your own IP address. Click the links in my reply and make sure to read them carefully to ensure the proper process has been followed. If you’ve done so and are unable to connect please let us know.
